Cherryade-fueled NFTs from another dimension

In 1985, a severely damaged Trog starship breached the Earth’s Interplanetary Defence Barrier. As the stricken planet killer hit the English Channel it split in two, liberating the Pandimensional race known as the Phanackapans from their bonds to their abusive Trog overlords.

In the years that followed, the Phanackapans thrived under the sea, using their powers to manipulate matter to build a home for themselves. But now, these amazing little Pandimensional entities have chosen to use their powers of matter-manipulation for good, to create a cleaner environment for us all.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_fullwidth_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Wiki-Hero-1.jpg” alt=”Kalaxion Invasion Guide” title_text=”Kalaxion Invasion Guide” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ width=”100vw” max_width=”100vw” custom_margin=”50px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_fullwidth_image][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”21px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Pandimensionals are characters from The Broadcliffs series of novels by acclaimed author and cult-comic book artist Sam Banfield, aka Ulysees Funk. Lovingly illustrated by PJ Cooper, together the duo have created the Pandimensional NFT Universe. Explore the rich tapestry of stories, artwork and lore that will tie together multiple NFT collections, 1/1 limited editions, and more. 

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjMwNzQifX0=@” button_text=”The Lore” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”off|off|off” admin_label=”Section” module_id=”roadmap” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”88px|||||” da_popup_slug=”roadmap” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_module=”3417″ global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”30px||-19px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”||||||||” header_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”63px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Roadmap

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#999999″ width=”90%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|38px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our roadmap has been designed to continually add value to your genesis NFT. Each phase is dependent upon the completion of the previous phase. Please join our Discord to get full project updates.

Phase 1

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”21px” text_line_height=”2em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Big Bang

  • The Genesis Pandimensional NFT presale opens – date to be confirmed
  • The public sale opens 24 hours later.

FREE Cherryade Bar Opens

  • 10% charity wallet and 2.5% community/arts wallet
  • All PFP owners can claim free Cherryade in the bar
  • For every NFT you own, you’ll receive a Cherryade gift.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”opacity: 0.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FREE Cherryade Powered Pandimensional NFTs

  • Feed your NFT with Cherryade and watch it morph into a 2nd Generation Pandimensional (your original NFT will be unharmed)

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”opacity: 0.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Phase 4

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”21px” text_line_height=”2em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FREE Pandimensional Hive Egg NFTs

  • Every PFP owner will receive a free Pandimensional Hive Egg NFT
  • Give your Hive Egg some Cherryade and hatch your Hive Egg NFT into a 3rd Generation Pandimensional NFT – you might get more than one hatchling.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”opacity: 0.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Member-only content and merchandise

  • Every NFT owner will receive a free Pandimensional comic NFT
  • Every NFT owner will receive a free Pandimensional story ebook NFT
  • Every NFT owner will get access to Pandimensional merchandise
  • Member-only content on the website is unlocked, with hidden secrets for your tribe

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,3_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”opacity: 0.3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Limited Editions

  • THE VOID limited edition 1/1 NFTs will be auctioned for charity
  • The VOID companions limited edition NFT collection drops
  • The Shadow Machine limited edition 1/1 NFTs will be auctioned for charity

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Section” module_id=”special” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” custom_padding=”||0px|||” da_popup_slug=”special” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Sending Payments” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ custom_margin=”|auto|2px|auto|false|false” custom_padding=”||106px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ text_font=”Rubik||||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”2em” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|24px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

What you get…

  • Membership of a tight-knit community
  • Member-only content, free NFTs, IRL events and much more
  • Exciting roadmap that pushes the boundaries of imagination
  • The commercial rights to your NFT
  • Cool artwork by a team of fun-loving nerds
  • And, we only receive 5% of royalties – of which 10% goes to charity

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/join-presale/?utm_source=homepage&utm_medium=organic&utm_campaign=allowlist” button_text=”Get whitelisted” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”gcid-41cc06a7-7f97-4419-940f-c66ee487735b” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-41cc06a7-7f97-4419-940f-c66ee487735b%22:%91%22button_bg_color%22%93}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Services” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”#000000″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#2e3857″ background_color_gradient_end=”#212529″ background_enable_image=”off” background_position=”bottom_center” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”99px|0px|69px|0px||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_module=”2869″ global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”New standard of payments” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ text_font_size=”20px” custom_padding=”0px|0px|43px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let’s clean up your dimension

In return for supporting the Pandimensional NFTs we will donate 10% of our profits to charities that support and ensure a cleaner environment for our children. We are particularly supportive of charities that seek to clean our oceans and decrease the deforestation of the Amazon.

We’ll donate 10% to selected charities when each of our drops have been fully minted and announce which charities have received the donation. But we won’t stop there, every 6 months we will donate 10% of our royalties made on the secondary market.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://medium.com/the-pandimensionals” button_text=”The mission” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Our Services” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”#000000″ background_color_gradient_start=”#2e3857″ background_color_gradient_end=”#212529″ background_enable_image=”off” background_position=”bottom_center” custom_padding=”100px|0px|5px|0px||” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” global_module=”817″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”New standard of payments” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”20px” width=”90%” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Meet the team

We’re a team of creatives, writers, technologists and big thinkers who just want to create cool shit, make new friends and build a community to be proud of. We’re based in the UK (yes we know Harry and Megan and can get you an invite to Buckingham Palace) and France (oo la la).

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ custom_margin=”-35px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/PJ-Cooper-hex.png” alt=”PJ Cooper” title_text=”PJ-Cooper” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”15px” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”38px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

PJ Cooper

@MrPJCooper

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_icon font_icon=”||divi||400″ icon_width=”30px” url=”https://www.linkedin.com/in/coopstar/” url_new_window=”on” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_icon][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

PJ Cooper hails from Dimension #CW122HN. Following stints working with brands such as Apple, Google, Disney, Adobe, Bentley, the BBC, Vitality and Sony Playstation as a designer, coder and product manager, PJ made the decision to create PTCo. with some of the talented friends he made along the way.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Ulysees-Funk-hex.png” alt=”Ulysees Funk” title_text=”Ulysees-Funk” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”15px” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”38px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Ulysees Funk

@drGrippa

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_icon font_icon=”||divi||400″ icon_width=”30px” url=”https://www.linkedin.com/in/sam-banfield-16969245/” url_new_window=”on” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_icon][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Ulysees Funk hails from Dimension #DA68JD. A talented child artist and writer, Funk has been prolific in his creation of characters and stories from an early age. A published author and prodigious talent, he’s an enigma you won’t see on social media very much. He’s currently renovating a fairytale chateau in France.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ background_color=”RGBA(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.pandimensionals.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Darryl-hex.png” alt=”Darryl Sparey” title_text=”Darryl” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”15px” header_3_font=”Rubik||||||||” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_margin=”38px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Darryl Sparey

@DarrylSparey

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_icon font_icon=”||divi||400″ icon_width=”30px” url=”https://www.linkedin.com/in/darryl-sparey/” url_new_window=”on” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_icon][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Darryl Sparey hails from Dimension #BH1. He’s an award winning PR maestro. Seriously, check out his Twitter. It’s full of awards. He builds hype, brands, and blue-chips. He’s the excitable one of the team. Darryl knows anyone who’s anyone in the media and PR world and manages our community team.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”0px|0px|98px|0px|false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Pandimensionals is an NFT art collection of 2D illustrated NFTs. Use your Pandimensional NFT as your profile picture on social media and stand out from the crowd. We’ve designed the Pandimensional NFTs to be representative of everyone, no matter your ethnicity, faith, gender or sexuality. If you’re looking for cool NFTs to use on your Twitter, Facebook or other social media account, you won’t find a better one than a Pandimensional NFT.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: UNLOCK THE SECRETS OF THEPANDIMENSIONALS A story-focused, community driven NFT Project by @MrPJCooper and @drgrippaMint date: TBC | Mint price: 0.05 ETH | PRESALE: Buy 1 get 2 freePANDIMENSIONALSA story-focused, community driven NFT Project by @MrPJCooper and @drgrippa  Cherryade-fueled NFTs from another dimension In 1985, a severely damaged Trog starship breached the Earth’s Interplanetary Defence […]
